footer.description: {{nickname}} brings you random videos and their most liked comment from YouTube! All videos are retrieved by powerful algorithms (not really, but it sounded good...). If you love YouTube comments as much as we do, you'll find more comments and videos on our Instagram and Twitter accounts.
